ygData.subject: RE: Appearance question
ygData.msgSnippet: I would think that, but the wood elf females I have seen with them are also light blue tinged, maybe someone thought it would be funny to have male woodsies
ygData.messageBody:
I would think that, but the wood elf females I have seen with them are also
light blue tinged, maybe someone thought it would be funny to have male
woodsies wear pink and females wear blue.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
Sent: Thursday, November 11, 1999 11:40 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Appearance question


From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>

it may be a video card thing, but i'm not sure. i know a wood elf male
friend in mithril legs definitely has a pinkish hue, while when i wear them
(wood elf female) they look normally as light blue.

Shada


> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> An appearance question for all you steel plate wearing
> wood-elf males out
> there. What color is your steel plate tinged with? I am
> wearing the shin
> greaves, which I thought would look just like plate, but I
> have never seen
> anyone else with legs that are this color. They appear to be
> a rose tinged
> silvery hue on me and ever since I put them on I constantly
> get "XXXXXX is
> examining your equipment" or whatever that message is. The
> wood elf females
> I have seen in what looked like steel plate were blue tinged.
> Is this the
> normal appearance of steel plate on wood elves? If the rose
> color is normal
> then I guess I have never seen any wood elves in steel plate on E'ci.
>
> Kitasi

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
the subject lol.
